Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the establishment of notice requirements for credit card fees or surcharges; repealer
Summary: Establishes notice requirements for fees or surcharges imposed by sellers when a credit card is used as payment for the sale of goods or services.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง518, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to credit card surcharge or fee notice requirements; and to repeal section 518 of such law relating thereto
